sentence: After actually reading the article, however, one realizes the headline Salon chose to go with "GOP Senate candidate Herschel Walker lied about his college achievements" is far more accurate.
author: Amanda Marcotte
title: Here's why MAGA world loves lies that are too big and stupid to be believed
